    • Method Detail

      • getLoginUrl

        public static String getLoginUrl(UUID state,
                                 UUID nonce,
                                 int listenPort)
                          throws NumberFormatException,
                                 IOException
        Return the login url with all parameters to open in broswer
        Parameters:
        state - a random uuid
        nonce - a random uuid
        listenPort - the listen port of returnUrl
        Returns:
        the login url
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - In case of listenPort is not a string in properties
        IOException - In case of exception while reading properties

      • getTokenFromRefresh

        public static TokenResponse getTokenFromRefresh(TokenResponse tokens,
                                                String tenantId)
        Request token api to refresh the identification token When token have expired, we need to refresh token
        Parameters:
        tokens - The initial token object
        tenantId - The id of daemon instance
        Returns:
        A valid tokenResponse in case of success, an token response with error in case of error

      • getTokenFromAuthCode

        public static TokenResponse getTokenFromAuthCode(String authCode,
                                                 String tenantId)
        Initial request to get Token from authentication return
        Parameters:
        authCode - The authCode getting from mini-webserver
        tenantId - The tenantId getting from mini-webserver
        Returns:
        A valid token response in case of success, a TokenResponse with error in other case
